name: Super Snake: Three kings
description:
Super Snake: Three kings - It is an exciting and fun retro game that is addictive with its gameplay, and will not leave you indifferent to her. In the game there are three types of snakes, and each of them are different maps which will complicate gameplay.

Get a charge of nostalgia, playing the classic version of snake, where you can climb out on the other side of the playing field, but you can't crash into itself or the obstacles that there are in the levels.

Features:
- Three species of snakes: Classic Snake, Color Snake, Super Snake
- Two types of controls: - Touch, Arrows
- 15 different maps of obstacles(5 on each snake)
- Picking up bonuses and accumulation of coins
- Passing through walls
- Achievements and leaderboards

The main objective is still left - hungry snake, appearing point or apples that need to eat and grow, the more to eat - the greater will become, at the same time the more points you earn.

To open a new snakes and maps need to accumulate a certain number of coins that you will be given of picking up bonuses, and the passing game.
Snake - a classic for android, which we will never forget and will not cease to love.

Your feedback is very important to us!
Good game!
